documentation.content:
## AND gate with Common Cause Failure in ProbLog

```prolog
%%script problog-cli.py
a :- b,c.
0.01::a.

0.5::b. evidence(b,false).
0.5::c. evidence(c,false).
query(a).

	a : 0.01
```

## ProbLog: AND gate with Common Cause Failure (CCF)

```problog
%%script problog-cli.py
a :- b,c.
0.01::a.

0.5::b. evidence(b,false).
0.5::c. evidence(c,false).
query(a).
```

## ProbLog: Basic AND gate for fault diagnosis

```problog
%%script problog-cli.py
c :- a, b.
```

## ProbLog Specific Builtins

```Prolog
try_call/N.  % same as call/N but silently fail if the called predicate is undefined
subquery(+Goal, ?Probability).
subquery(+Goal, ?Probability, +ListOfEvidence).
subquery(+Goal, ?Probability, +ListOfEvidence, +Semiring, +Evaluator).
debugprint/N. % print messages to stderr
write/N.      % print messages to stdout
writenl/N.    % print messages and newline to stdout
nl/0.         % print newline to stdout
error/N.      % raise a UserError with some message
cmd_args/1.   % read the list of command line arguments passed to ProbLog with the '-a' arguments
```

## ProbLog AND Gate for Fault Diagnosis

```problog
c :- a, b.
```

## Prolog: Resolving Uninstantiated Variable with Auxiliary Predicate

```prolog
a(_,_).
exists_a(X) :- a(X, Y).
0.4::c(X) :- exists_a(X).
query(c(1)).
```

## Noisy OR Gate with Leak Probability in ProbLog

```prolog
%%script problog-cli.py
0.9::a :- b.
0.9::a :- c.
0.1::a.

0.5::b. evidence(b,false).
0.5::c. evidence(c,true).
query(a).

	a : 0.91
```

## ProbLog: Noisy XOR gate for fault modeling

```problog
%%script problog-cli.py
0.1::a :-   b,  c.
0.9::a :-   b,\+c.
0.9::a :- \+b,  c.
0.1::a :- \+b,\+c.

0.5::b. evidence(b,false).
0.5::c. evidence(c,true).
query(a).
```

## ProbLog: Inhibited Noisy-Or with Negated Heads

```problog
0.5::c1. 0.5::c2.

0.3::e1 :- c1.
0.2::\+e1 :- c2.

0.4::e2 :- c2.
0.2::\+e2 :- c1.

e :- e1.
e :- e2.

evidence(c1,true).
evidence(c2,true).
         
query(e).
```

## Noisy XOR Gate in ProbLog

```prolog
%%script problog-cli.py
0.1::a :-   b,  c.
0.9::a :-   b,\+c.
0.9::a :- \+b,  c.
0.1::a :- \+b,\+c.

0.5::b. evidence(b,false).
0.5::c. evidence(c,true).
query(a).

	a : 0.9
```
